greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows T(n,k) in which row n has length A000041(n-1) and every column k is A024916, n >= 1, k >= 1.
comment: Conjecture: the sum of row n equals A066186(n), the sum of all parts of all partitions of n.
example: For n = 6 the length of row 6 is A000041(5) = 7.
The sum of row 6 is 33 + 15 + 8 + 4 + 4 + 1 + 1 = 66, equaling A066186(6) = 66.
xref: The length of the m-th block in row n is A187219(m), m >= 1.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jan 07 2021
